title: Make more features in spectate PLEASE!
body: I am part of a clan that runs a tournament every week and has almost ten teams. We stream these tournaments and want to make sure each side is free of arguments and such. I think allowing custom spectates to be able to decrease delay of the spectate and see the team chat as well. I would really like something like this.

replies.body: I do think that 5 mins is alot, maybe reducing it to 2-3 mins maybe?
